title: A Formula for the K-Th Covariant Derivative.pdf
abstract:
. The aim of the present paper is to give a formula for the k-th covariant derivative of tensor ﬁeld along a given curve. In order to do that, ﬁrst the symbols P i j and Qi j which depend on the Christoﬀel symbols are introduced. Some properties of them are also given. The main result is given by (3.1) and further it is generalized for k ∈R. Key words: covariant derivative, fractional covariant derivative 1. Introduction of the symbols P i j and Qi j . Let x(s) be a given curve on a diﬀerentiable manifold Mn which is endowed with aﬃne connection Γ. The k-th covariant derivative ∇k ˙x along the curve x(s) will be denoted by ∇k. We shall deal further in a local coordinate system.
